Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add True North Trips - Three-Segment Platform

Implemented comprehensive True North Trips branding and three-segment user experience for Yellowknife trip planning platform.

Major Features:
- Three-segment navigation: Visiting, Living, and Moving to Yellowknife
- Complete brand identity with TRUE NORTH TRIPS master brand
- Aurora-inspired color palette and design system
- Scalable architecture for territorial expansion (NWT, Yukon, Nunavut)

Technical Changes:
- Created /visiting page for tourists with trip planning features
- Created /living page for residents with local events and guides
- Created /moving page for relocators with housing and job market info
- Updated homepage with three pathway selection
- Added TypeScript types for UserSegment, ResidentType, RelocatorType
- Configured Tailwind with territory-specific color palettes
- Fixed smart quote syntax errors in quiz page

Documentation:
- BRAND-STRATEGY.md: Comprehensive branding guidelines (15K+ words)
- THREE-SEGMENT-STRATEGY.md: Market analysis and product roadmap
- brand-guidelines.html: Interactive visual brand guide
- Complete API documentation and database schemas
